context_bundle.summary: Claude Code launcher wrapper fix. npm updates overwrite launcher - recreate wrapper pointing to claude-bin.

onboarding.quick_start: If claude command broken after update: 1. Rename symlink to claude-bin. 2. Create bash wrapper as claude. 3. Wrapper loads brain regions + shows banner.
common_patterns: Wrapper shows banner, loads brain, waits for ready
known_errors: Claude Code npm updates OVERWRITE /usr/local/bin/claude with symlink
Wrapper disappears after update - must recreate
